message.content:
{"id": "116829", "title": "Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.", "description": "Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label's height does not update immediately.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the interface.
2. Edit the font size of the label to be 18 points.

Expected behavior: The label's height should adjust accordingly to justify the font size.", "OB": "The label's height does not change when the font size is modified.", "EB": "The label's height should adjust to justify the font size when it is modified.", "SR": "When modifying the font size of a label, verify that the label's height is adjusted to correctly justify the font size."}
